welcome_message_body: Welcome to Bornova, Turkey! Get ready to be charmed by our city's rich history, bustling markets, and beautiful parks. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Bornova has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cigli AB Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal serves all international flights and airlines.

terminals.name: Domestic Terminal
terminals.description: The domestic terminal serves all domestic flights and airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
